enchantment.hasoook.random_bullets.desc: Shoots a random type of bullet.
enchantment.hasoook.separation_explosion: Automatically explodes when separated from the item’s drop by 10 meters.
enchantment.hasoook.disdain.desc: The item’s drops will actively move away from you.
enchantment.hasoook.swap.desc: Swaps the main-hand items of both parties when attacking.
enchantment.hasoook.chain_damage.desc: When attacking, deals damage to a single additional target of the same type within range.
enchantment.hasoook.give.desc: Give the item to the target.
